Perceptor/Blackstorm:

"You hear the master, my dear Blackstorm "said kindly Perceptor "You 
can got to rest... I need you in good shape, 'cause soon you will be 
trained and I need a nice assistant..."

Blackstorm nodded and she letf the place and looked a quarters.

Perceptor sat down around tank's room. He still have alot to speak 
with Hydras.
